Welcome to ACADEMe, an AI-powered person: Welcome to ACADEMe, an AI-powered personalized education platform. This Privacy Policy explains how Team VISI0N (“we”, “our”, or “us”) collects, uses, protects, and shares your personal information when you use our website, mobile app, and services (collectively, the “Platform”). By using ACADEMe, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use our Platform.
We collect personal information that you:
We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide, including:

• Name and contact details (email address, phone number)
• Account credentials (username, password)
• Educational information (academic level, subjects of interest, learning goals)
• Profile information (age, location, educational background)
• Communications (messages, feedback, support inquiries)
• Device information …:
• Device information (IP address, browser type, device identifiers)
• Usage data (pages visited, time spent, click patterns, navigation behavior)
• Performance metrics (app crashes, loading times, errors)
• Location data (approximate geolocation based on IP address)
• Cookies and similar tracking technologies
• Learning analytics …:
• Learning analytics and progress tracking
• Personalized recommendations and content suggestions
• Performance predictions and assessments
• Behavior patterns and learning preferences
• AI-generated insights about your learning journey
We use your information for the followin: We use your information for the following purposes:
• Provide personalized …:
• Provide personalized learning experiences and content
• Generate adaptive learning paths based on your progress
• Deliver AI-powered recommendations and insights
• Track and record educational progress
• Offer multilingual learning support
• Create and manage your account …:
• Create and manage your account
• Authenticate users and prevent fraud
• Provide customer support and respond to inquiries
• Send important notifications and updates
• Improve our Platform and develop new features
• Consent: AI processing …:
• Consent: AI processing, marketing communications
• Contract: To deliver educational services
• Legitimate Interest: Platform improvement, security
• Legal Obligation: Compliance with applicable laws
We may share your information with trust:
We may share your information with trusted third-party providers who help operate the Platform, including:

• Firebase: database and authentication
• Google Gemini: AI and machine learning services
• ClickUp: form submissions and data handling
• LibreTranslate & Whisper: translation and speech processing
• Railway & Docker: cloud hosting and deployment
5.2 We Do NOT Sell Personal Data: 5.2 We Do NOT Sell Personal Data
We do not sell, rent, or trade your pers: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.
We may disclose your information if requ: We may disclose your information if required by law or to protect our rights, property, or safety.
We implement appropriate security measur:
We implement appropriate security measures to protect your data, including:

• Encryption in transit and at rest
• Secure authentication and access controls
• Regular security reviews and updates
• Limited access to personal data on a need-to-know basis
• Incident response protocols
We retain your personal information …:
We retain your personal information as long as necessary:

• To provide educational services
• To comply with legal obligations
• To resolve disputes and enforce agreements
• To improve our Platform

If you request account deletion, we will delete or anonymize your personal data within 30 days unless otherwise required by law.
As a global education platform …: As a global education platform, your data may be processed and transferred to countries outside your own, including India and the United States. We ensure appropriate safeguards for international transfers.
Depending on your location …: Depending on your location, you may have the right to:
Request a copy …: Request a copy of your data and transfer it to another service
Update or correct …: Update or correct inaccurate personal information
Request deletion …: Request deletion of your personal data
Opt out of data processing …: Opt out of data processing for marketing or AI analytics
Our Platform uses artificial intelligenc:
Our Platform uses artificial intelligence to personalize your learning experience. This includes:

• Automatically suggesting content based on learning history
• Adjusting assessment difficulty through AI
• Predictive analytics on learning outcomes
• Natural language processing for multilingual support

You may opt out of automated decision-making and request human review for decisions that significantly affect you.
Our Platform is designed for users of al:
Our Platform is designed for users of all ages, including children under the age of 13. We comply with applicable child data protection laws like COPPA. If you are under 13, please ensure your parent or guardian reviews this policy and approves your use.

Parents or guardians may contact us to review, update, or delete their child's information.
We use cookies and similar technologies:
We use cookies and similar technologies to:

• Remember your preferences and settings
• Analyze Platform usage and performance
• Provide personalized content and features
• Ensure security and prevent fraud

You can manage cookies via your browser settings, but disabling them may affect Platform functionality.
We may update this Privacy Policy …:
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices, technology, legal requirements, or other factors. Significant changes will be communicated through:

• Posting the updated policy on our Platform
• Email notifications for major changes
• Updating the “Last Updated” date above
If you have any questions …: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
This Privacy Policy is governed by the l: This Privacy Policy is governed by the laws of India and applicable international data protection laws, including but not limited to the Digital Personal Data Protection Act 2023, the GDPR (for EU users), and the CCPA (for California users).
